Summary: Lighted very small disk flying overhead
divs: Sighting DetailsSmall bright bluish-white disk similar in appearance to Jupiter but maybe 3 times larger flew SW over the house. The object was moving fast and appeared to dip or drop in altitude and then flatten out again. It was out of sight in 4 seconds or less. Made no sound and displayed no tail or trail of sparks. The object flew in essentially a straight line at a constant speed. Speed appeared to greatly exceed a commercial jet liner. First thought it was remnant of a firework. We noticed it because it was bright; very crisp in appearance. We were rather speechless at first then we starrted sharing our amazement. We lost sight as it went behind trees.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Olney
There were no other sightings in Olney on or around December 24th 2011
